message: Just wondered if anyone is using Pyramid for production apps yet (or is building a production app).
I have planned release to put into production in late spring.

I have had a small app out in production since repoze.bfg 0.5 or 0.6 in Feb or March of 2009. I have a prototype that has about 100K item import primer. I have another app about to go live in 2 weeks.
There are tons of repoze.bfg based apps in productions, does it count? :-)
repoze.bfg == pyramid, so yes, why not ?
We be launching a production app developed in pyramid next month
i'm going to launch a pyramid app in a month or two.
Launching a pyramid app within the next couple months at work, pyramid+celery
I plan on launching a pyramid app in aprox. a month
both bfg and pyramid in production here.
